blocks.name: diophrex
blocks.content: Projecting a Diophantine set by removing a coordinate results in a Diophantine set. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 10-Oct-2014.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: eq0rabdioph
blocks.content: This is the first of a number of theorems which allow sets to be proven Diophantine by syntactic induction, and models the correspondence between Diophantine sets and monotone existential first-order logic. This first theorem shows that the zero set of an implicit polynomial is Diophantine. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 10-Oct-2014.)

blocks.name: 0dioph
blocks.content: The null set is Diophantine. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 10-Oct-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm 0dioph(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(emptycls, cfv(cdioph, c0)))
} = {
  syl5eqelr(emptycls, cfv(cdioph, c0), crab(hs0, co(cn0, cmap, co(nat1, cfz, c0)), wceq(nat1, nat0)), wcel(c0, cn0))

  rgenw(hs0, co(cn0, cmap, co(nat1, cfz, c0)), wn(wceq(nat1, nat0)))
  neii(nat1, nat0)
  ax-1ne0()
  rabeq0(hs0, co(cn0, cmap, co(nat1, cfz, c0)), wceq(nat1, nat0))
  mpan2(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(crab(hs0, co(cn0, cmap, co(nat1, cfz, c0)), wceq(nat1, nat0)), cfv(cdioph, c0)), wcel(cmpt(hs0, co(cz, cmap, co(nat1, cfz, c0)), nat1), cfv(cmzp, co(nat1, cfz, c0))))
  mp2an(wcel(cmpt(hs0, co(cz, cmap, co(nat1, cfz, c0)), nat1), cfv(cmzp, co(nat1, cfz, c0))), wcel(co(nat1, cfz, c0), universe), wcel(nat1, cz))
  ovex(nat1, cfz, c0)
  1z()
  mzpconstmpt(hs0, co(nat1, cfz, c0), nat1)
  eq0rabdioph(hs0, c0, nat1)
  diff.hs0.c(co(nat1, cfz, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(nat1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)

blocks.name: vdioph
blocks.content: The "universal" set (as large as possible given ~ eldiophss ) is Diophantine. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 10-Oct-2014.)

thm vdioph(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(co(cn0, cmap, co(nat1, cfz, c0)), cfv(cdioph, c0)))
} = {

  rgenw(hs0, co(cn0, cmap, co(nat1, cfz, c0)), wceq(nat0, nat0))
  eqid(nat0)
  rabid2(hs0, co(cn0, cmap, co(nat1, cfz, c0)), wceq(nat0, nat0))
  mpan2(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(crab(hs0, co(cn0, cmap, co(nat1, cfz, c0)), wceq(nat0, nat0)), cfv(cdioph, c0)), wcel(cmpt(hs0, co(cz, cmap, co(nat1, cfz, c0)), nat0), cfv(cmzp, co(nat1, cfz, c0))))
  mp2an(wcel(cmpt(hs0, co(cz, cmap, co(nat1, cfz, c0)), nat0), cfv(cmzp, co(nat1, cfz, c0))), wcel(co(nat1, cfz, c0), universe), wcel(nat0, cz))
  ovex(nat1, cfz, c0)
  0z()
  mzpconstmpt(hs0, co(nat1, cfz, c0), nat0)
  eq0rabdioph(hs0, c0, nat0)
  diff.hs0.c(co(cn0, cmap, co(nat1, cfz, c0)))
